scripts.build:ssr: vite build --ssrManifest --outDir ${CSR_OUT:-dist/client} && vite build --ssr src/adapters/${ADAPTER:-node}/index.ts --outDir ${SSR_OUT:-dist/server} && rm -rf ${CSR_OUT:-dist/client}/.vite
scripts.build:cloudflare: ADAPTER=cloudflare CSR_OUT=dist SSR_OUT=functions npm run build:ssr && cp src/adapters/cloudflare/_routes.json dist && mv functions/index.js functions/[[catchall]].js
scripts.build:ssg: ADAPTER=ssg CSR_OUT=dist SSR_OUT=.ssg npm run build:ssr && node .ssg/index.js && rm -rf .ssg && if [ ${NOJS:-0} -eq 1 ]; then rm dist/**/*.js; fi
